input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Core Jersey White/Black"
Reference Product Description:
The all-new Core Jersey is a high-quality staple for cyclists in pursuit of optimal comfort and durability. Our sustainable manufacturing process has evolved to incorporate recycled yarns, while the ultra-soft knitted fabric provides superior durability and form-fitting compression for all body types. Lightweight construction enhances the freedom of movement, and advanced moisture-wicking technology regulates body temperature during intense rides. With three convenient rear pockets and a zipper-secured storage pocket, youâ€™ll have ample space to stow your riding essentials. Arriving in five new colourways, the reimagined CORE Jersey is a must-have addition to your cycling wardrobe.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Santini Leader General Classification - King Jersey - Man - Red'
  - Name='Tour de France 2024 Authentic Team Jersey Man by Santini'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Ultra-Light Sleek Stripe Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Red Rock Aero Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's High-Viz Mesh Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Assos Women's Dyora R S11 Surface Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Attack Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Charge Short Sleeve Road Jersey Torch Red-Smoked Pearl'
  - Name='Men's Pearl Izumi Attack Jersey'
  - Name='Woman Assos Uma GTV Jersey C2'
  - Name='Men's Pearl Izumi Summit Short Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Attack Air Men's Jersey'
  - Name='Man Sportful Light Pro Jersey'
  - Name='Sportful Bomber Jersey'
  - Name='MAAP Green Training Thermal LS Jersey T-shirt'
  - Name='Santini Imola 1968 UCI Short Sleeve Jersey Man'
  - Name='Men's Pactimo Sale Long Sleeve MTB Shirt'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Range LS Merino Wool MTB Shirt'
  - Name='Assos Mille GTS Jersey S11 Men's'
  - Name='CASTELLI Men's Entrata 6 Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Castelli Prologo Lite Jersey Men's'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Classic Jersey'
  - Name='Castelli Espresso Thermal Jersey'
  - Name='Castelli Espresso Jersey Men's Long Sleeve'
  - Name='CASTELLI Men's Espresso Cycling Jersey 2020'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Leader General Classification - King Jersey - Man - Red
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a men's cycling jersey likely similar in function and construction to the reference Core Jersey, focusing on high performance and possibly advanced features suitable for competitive cycling.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tour de France 2024 Authentic Team Jersey Man by Santini
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Authentic official team jersey likely designed for cycling, similar in silhouette and intended use, though possibly more focused on branding and style rather than sustainability or fabric technology.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Ultra-Light Sleek Stripe Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A men's cycling jersey described as ultra-light and sleek, aligning well with lightweight, durable, and performance-focused attributes of the reference Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Red Rock Aero Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: An aero cycling jersey designed for performance cycling, relevant due to use case and construction, though may emphasize aerodynamics more than sustainability.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's High-Viz Mesh Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A men's high-visibility mesh cycling jersey, relevant for cycling function and breathability, although mesh construction may differ from the knitted fabric of the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Women's Dyora R S11 Surface Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A women's high-performance cycling jersey, sharing core design intent but targeting a female fit and possibly different fabric technology.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Attack Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A standard men's cycling jersey focusing on performance and comfort, likely similar in silhouette, fabric function, and intended cycling use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Charge Short Sleeve Road Jersey Torch Red-Smoked Pearl
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A road cycling jersey that serves a similar purpose but may have different fabric constructions or specific features compared to the reference jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Pearl Izumi Attack Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same as above; a men's cycling jersey designed for road cycling performance, aligning with reference product in function and features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Woman Assos Uma GTV Jersey C2
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A women's cycling jersey likely high-quality and performance focused but less relevant due to gender-specific fit and possibly different construction details.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Pearl Izumi Summit Short Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A men's short sleeve cycling jersey intended for performance and comfort; relevant though may differ in fabric technology or sustainability focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Attack Air Men's Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely a mid to high-performance men's cycling jersey with focus on comfort and breathability, relevant in silhouette and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Man Sportful Light Pro Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A men's cycling jersey likely emphasizing light weight and performance, similar in intended use though fabric and sustainability details are unclear.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful Bomber Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A cycling jersey probably focusing on a specific style or seasonal use; relevant but possibly less similar in fabric tech or feature set.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Green Training Thermal LS Jersey T-shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A thermal long sleeve cycling jersey, more specialized for colder conditions, diverges from the reference which is lightweight and short sleeve.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Imola 1968 UCI Short Sleeve Jersey Man
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A men's short sleeve cycling jersey with racing influence; relevant in silhouette and purpose, although historical or style focus may reduce feature overlap.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Pactimo Sale Long Sleeve MTB Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: An MTB long sleeve shirt, likely heavier and designed for mountain biking versus road cycling, less relevant in fabric and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Range LS Merino Wool MTB Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve MTB shirt made of Merino wool, functionally and materially different from lightweight, knitted synthetic Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Mille GTS Jersey S11 Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-performance men's cycling jersey similar in intended use, performance focus, and possibly fabric technology aligning closely with reference jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CASTELLI Men's Entrata 6 Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's road cycling jersey with performance orientation, relevant in use but may differ in fabric makeup and sustainability focus.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: A lightweight men's cycling jersey similar in silhouette and purpose, matching the lightweight and performance aspects of the reference.
